info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 43398
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 43398
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 4, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
direccte.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.sante.gouv.fr include:_spf.pfai.rie.gouv.fr include:_spf-njo.cegedim.fr ~all"
direccte.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"cisco-ci-domain-verification=4f0dbd28841cdec33cfa3966c36911028ffbbcd90a6a9c4b34ecd75286ea17d2"
direccte.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"R+PuUwRUOuIkhtFtitRXWrMTFS6Au3xy7/TK7gHSDIMusO78eAv8a04QXuol8S0Nq4V7RMAvrbpSW29dddtPjg=="
direccte.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"MS=ms10035681"

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 63391
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 63391
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 7, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;direccte.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns2.perf1.fr.
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	a.ns.developpement-durable.gouv.fr.
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns4.perf1.de.
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns1.perf1.com.
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns5.perf1.asia.
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	b.ns.developpement-durable.gouv.fr.
direccte.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns3.perf1.eu.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: direccte.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 231 Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1 Date: Sun, 03 Jul 2022 02:40:41 GMT Location: https://dreets.gouv.fr/ Server: Apache Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-direccte.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=950097930.20480.0000; path=/; Httponly; Secure 301 Moved Permanently

Moved Permanently

The document has moved here.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: direccte.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://direccte.gouv.fr/'
